offset.description: the number of cells to offset Col from the left

order.description: raster order, used in flex layout mode

pull.description: the number of cells that raster is moved to the left

push.description: the number of cells that raster is moved to the right

span.description: raster number of cells to occupy, 0 corresponds to display: none

xs.description: <576px and also default setting, could be a span value or an object containing above props

sm.description: ≥576px, could be a span value or an object containing above props

md.description: ≥768px, could be a span value or an object containing above props

lg.description: ≥992px, could be a span value or an object containing above props

xl.description: ≥1200px, could be a span value or an object containing above props

xxl.description: ≥1600px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
